ask_for_edit_profile: Do you want edit your profile data?
name: Name
call_this_number: Do you want call this number?
do_u_suffer: Do you suffer from chronic diseases?
every_three_seconds: Every three seconds someone needs a blood transfusion.
one_of_ten: One in ten patients admitted to hospital needs a blood transfusion.
your_blood: Your blood saves four people by separating its components, not one person.
refresh_blood: The process of donating blood restores vitality and activity to the body due to the renewal of blood cells.
donor_can_get_results: The donor can obtain the results of his own screening tests, including blood type.
process_of_donating: The donation process is done by collecting blood in a bag containing an anti-coagulant substance connected to a sterile needle used for one time only delivered from a vein in the arm, and the blood donation process takes place in a period of time approximately 5-10 minutes during this period the donor is under direct medical care, but The entire visit takes only 15-20 minutes.
why_not_donating: The reasons prevent you from donating?
reasons_prevent_donating:
1- All types of anemia except iron deficiency anemia.
2- Chronic chest diseases.
3- Chronic high blood pressure.
4- Viral hepatitis
5- Diabetes mellitus.
6- Cases of kidney failure.
7- Cases of hepatomegaly.
8- Cases of convulsions, epilepsy and frequent fainting.
9- Increase or decrease of thyroid secretions.
10- Pregnancy.
11- Hemorrhagic diseases.
12- Genetic diseases.
13- Psychiatric diseases.
14- Any operations during a period of three months.
15- Unexpected loss of weight and appetite.
16- Night sweats.
17- Nocturnal hotness.
when_can_redonate: It is recommended to donate blood after 6 months of the last donation, but it is possible to donate before that in the period of 3-4 months, but the donor must be medically fit.
amount_of_blood_in_single_donate: How much blood is taken at one time?
amount_of_blood: It is taken from 400 - 450 milliliters, which represents about 1 / 12 of the volume of blood inside the body of each person, which ranges between 5 - 6 liters.
sub_find_donors: Find donors matching the blood type you need.
